CustomField.description: If a committed forecast needs to be override, the PM will select the box & the record no longer be included on the forecast. This will allow for accurate reporting of PM accuracy % and accurate forecast information.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: If a committed forecast needs to be override, the PM will select the box & the record no longer be included on the forecast. This will allow for accurate reporting of PM accuracy % and accurate forecast information.
CustomField.label: Override Commit
